messages.speech: The Savers Credit is available to people with lower incomes who contribute to qualified retirement plans, like a 401(k), 403(b), IRA, Roth IRA or 457 plan. In order to qualify, your AGI must be below $32k if you are a single filer, $48k if you are a head of household and $64k if you are married filing jointly. The credit amount can range from $1k to $2k depending on income and filing status and you use Form 8880 to claim the credit on your tax return.
